00014  * Exception types: Exception heirarchy for Bayesian filtering 
00015  */

00017 // Common headers required for declerations
00018 #include <exception>
00019 
00020 /* Filter namespace */
00021 namespace Bayesian_filter
00022 {
00023 
00024 
00025 class Filter_exception : virtual public std::exception
00026 /*
00027  *  Base class for all exception produced by filter heirachy
00028  */
00029 {
00030 public:
00031     const char *what() const throw()
00032     {   return error_description;
00033     }
00034 protected:
00035     Filter_exception (const char* description)
00036     {   error_description = description;
00037     };
00038 private:
00039     const char* error_description;
00040 };
00041 
00042 class Logic_exception : virtual public Filter_exception
00043 /*
00044  * Logic Exception
00045  */
00046 {
00047 public:
00048     Logic_exception (const char* description) :
00049         Filter_exception (description)
00050     {};
00051 };
00052 
00053 class Numeric_exception : virtual public Filter_exception
00054 /*
00055  * Numeric Exception
00056  */
00057 {
00058 public:
00059     Numeric_exception (const char* description) :
00060         Filter_exception (description)
00061     {};
00062 };

00064 
00065 }//namespace
